alert.note: Alert for Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:25PM CDT until April 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL OKMULGEE COUNTY... At 1025 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Beggs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Okmulgee... Morris... Beggs... Schulter... Preston... Okmulgee State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
